casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE. No. 315PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. James E. Scarbrough, Concord, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. James R. Demay, Raleigh, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, for Town of Carthage. Jennifer Welch, Raleigh. James M. Carpenter, General Counsel, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America. William E. Hubbard, Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 25th of September 2015 by NC Home Builders Association, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
